content: With the Iron Pellet Soak equipped, using the gourd can no longer be interrupted by incoming attacks. Additionally, using the Gourd with the Soak provides considerable damage reduction.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Iron_Pellet.md', within the main section titled 'Iron Pellet'.
The content is as follows:
With the Iron Pellet Soak equipped, using the gourd can no longer be interrupted by incoming attacks. Additionally, using the Gourd with the Soak provides considerable damage reduction.
